S01svabhupu:1196: SvayambhuP_4.37 iti matvātra saṃsāre ye vāṃchanti sunirvṛtiṃ /
S01svabhupu:1197: tatra pravrajyā sānbauddhaṃ carantu śraddhayā vrataṃ //
S01svabhupu:1198: SvayambhuP_4.38 ityādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa niśamya te pravodhitāḥ /
S01svabhupu:1204: SvayambhuP_4.41 tataste sarva utthāya sāñjalayaḥ purāgatāḥ /
S01svabhupu:1206: SvayambhuP_4.42 bhagavannātha sarvajña dhṛtvājñā bhavatāṃ vayaṃ /
S01svabhupu:1208: SvayambhuP_4.43 bhagavansta bhavānasmān sarvān paśyan kṛpā dṛśā /
S01svabhupu:1210: SvayambhuP_4.44 iti taiḥ prārthite sarvairbhagavānsa munīśvaraḥ /
S01svabhupu:1212: SvayambhuP_4.45 yadyatra saugate dharmma pravrajituṃ samīcchatha /
S01svabhupu:1213: etat pravrajya sarvatra caradhvaṃ saugataṃ vrataṃ //
S01svabhupu:1214: SvayambhuP_4.46 ityādiśya sa saṃbuddhaḥ pāṇinā tacchiraḥspṛśan /
S01svabhupu:1216: SvayambhuP_4.47 tato 'vatārya te keśān rakta cīvara prāvṛtāḥ /
S01svabhupu:1218: SvayambhuP_4.48 tataḥ sa bhagavāntebhyoḥ yatibhyo saṃmyak saṃbodhipākṣikān /
S01svabhupu:1226: SvayambhuP_4.52 tatassarve 'pi te bauddhā yatayo bodhicāriṇaḥ /
S01svabhupu:1228: SvayambhuP_4.53 tataste ti viśuddhātmāḥ pañcābhijñā maharddhikāḥ /
S01svabhupu:1229: vandyāḥ pūjyāḥ sadevānāṃ lokānāṃ guravo bhavan //
S01svabhupu:1230: SvayambhuP_4.54 tasmiṃśca samaye tatra gireḥ śaṃkhasya mūrddhani /
S01svabhupu:1234: SvayambhuP_4.56 bhūyo 'pi sādadī tasyaḥ krakuchanda spatāyinaḥ /
S01svabhupu:1238: SvayambhuP_4.58 ye tatra vidhinā snātvā pitṛ devāditarpaṇaṃ /
S01svabhupu:1239: kṛtvā dānādikaṃ datvā vrataṃ cāpi prakurvate //
S01svabhupu:1242: SvayambhuP_4.60 iti matvā sadā tatra snātvā pitrāditarppaṇaṃ /
S01svabhupu:1246: SvayambhuP_4.62 prakṣālyāpi ca tatrāsyaṃ gaṃgā snāna phalaṃ labheta /
S01svabhupu:1247: śilasiṃ ca mātreṇa śuddhānte indriyāni ṣaṭ //
S01svabhupu:1248: SvayambhuP_4.63 evaṃ mahattaraṃ puṇyaṃ vāgmatī bhajanodbhavaṃ /
S01svabhupu:1249: sarve tīrthottamākhyātaṃ te nāsau vāgmatī jinaiḥ //
S01svabhupu:1250: SvayambhuP_4.64 iti matvātra saṃsāre icchanti ye sadāśubhaṃ /
S01svabhupu:1251: vāgmatī śrī sukhādhārāṃ bhajantu sarvadāpi te //
S01svabhupu:1254: SvayambhuP_4.66 tatra pravrajitānāṃ yat śmaśrukeśanakhāni ca /
S01svabhupu:1258: SvayambhuP_4.68 yāvanti śmaśru keśāni tāvantyapi śilātale /
S01svabhupu:1260: SvayambhuP_4.69 sāpi nadī mahātīrtha vāgmatī va prasīddhatā /
S01svabhupu:1268: SvayambhuP_4.73 dvitīyo bhucca gokarṇa sthale jyotirṣayākṛtiḥ /
S01svabhupu:1278: SvayambhuP_4.78 tatra sa nṛpa rājendraḥ krakuchandena tāyinā /
S01svabhupu:1286: tatastathā ca rājendro mañjudevaṃ ca saṅguruṃ //
S01svabhupu:1291: SvayambhuP_4.84 dṛṣṭvā samudito rājā mahotsāhaistathā bhajat /
S01svabhupu:1296: tataḥ so 'tra mahārājaḥ saṃsthāstuṃ kāma ātmanā //
S01svabhupu:1302: sādhu rājan mahāsattva yadevaṃ tvaṃ samīcchasi //
S01svabhupu:1303: SvayambhuP_4.90 tathātvamiha san sthitvā pālayaṃ bodhayan prajāḥ /
S01svabhupu:1305: SvayambhuP_4.91 bodhimārge pratiṣṭhāpya cārayasva sadā śubhe /
S01svabhupu:1307: SvayambhuP_4.92 yathākāma sukhaṃ tu prāsacarasva jagaddhite /
S01svabhupu:1311: SvayambhuP_4.94 śraddhayā bhajanaṃ kṛtvā saṃcarasva jagaddhite /
S01svabhupu:1313: SvayambhuP_4.95 sarvadā bhajanaṃ kṛtvā carasva bodhisaṃvaraṃ /
S01svabhupu:1315: SvayambhuP_4.96 buddhānuśāsanaṃ dhṛtvā saddharmme saṃcaraṃsva sa /
S01svabhupu:1317: SvayambhuP_4.97 śraddhayā bhajanaṃ kṛtvāḥ sādhaya dharmmamuktamaṃ /
S01svabhupu:1319: SvayambhuP_4.98 snāna dānādikaṃ kṛtvā pittṛndevāñca toṣayan /
S01svabhupu:1321: SvayambhuP_4.99 sarvasattvā hitaṃ kṛtvā nivasasva yathāsukhaṃ /
S01svabhupu:1323: SvayambhuP_4.100 eteṣāmapi sarveṣāṃ saṃsthāpya śaraṇe sadā /
S01svabhupu:1325: SvayambhuP_4.101 bodhimārge pratiṣṭhāpya cārayasva sadā śubhe /
S01svabhupu:1339: SvayambhuP_4.108 bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sadā sadgati saṃbhavāḥ /
S01svabhupu:1345: SvayambhuP_4.111 pūjāphala viśeṣatvaṃ va kṣyāmi śṛṇu tannṛpaḥ /
S01svabhupu:1347: SvayambhuP_4.112 aṣṭāvetān maheśān vītarāgān sadā bhajet /
S01svabhupu:1349: SvayambhuP_4.113 saṃsāre sarvadā saukhyaṃ bhuktvā yāyācchivālayaṃ /
S01svabhupu:1351: SvayambhuP_4.114 śivālayaṃ vrajet so 'pi madhurā brahmamandiraṃ /
S01svabhupu:1352: dadhnā yaḥ snāpayed devān vītarāgān svayaṃbhuvaḥ //
S01svabhupu:1353: SvayambhuP_4.115 sa yāyād vaiṣṇavaṃ lokaṃ śrī samṛddhi sukhāśrayaṃ /
S01svabhupu:1355: SvayambhuP_4.116 gandhodakena gāndharva kṣīreṇa śaśinaḥ padaṃ /
S01svabhupu:1357: SvayambhuP_4.117 eṣāṃ pūjāṃ ca yaḥ kuryānnānāpuṣpaiḥ sugandhitaiḥ /
S01svabhupu:1358: sarva kāma sukhaṃ bhuktvā modate manujādhipaḥ //
S01svabhupu:1360: śivaṃ sarvatra prāpnoti yajñānāṃ ca sahasrakaṃ //
S01svabhupu:1361: SvayambhuP_4.119 naivedyaṃ ḍhokayedyaḥ sa dīrdhāyuḥ syād vali nṛpaḥ /
S01svabhupu:1363: SvayambhuP_4.120 gugguruṃ yo dahettasya naśyate sarvapātakaṃ /
S01svabhupu:1365: SvayambhuP_4.121 suvarṇaṃ ye pradadyācca sa yāyāt saṅgatau sadā /
S01svabhupu:1367: SvayambhuP_4.122 raupyakhurāṃ hema śṛṃgī raṇad ghaṇṭhāvalaṃ vinā /
S01svabhupu:1368: savatsāṃ kapilāṃ dadyādyaḥ sa yajñaphalaṃ labhet //
S01svabhupu:1369: SvayambhuP_4.123 yo ratnakaṃcukaṃ dadyāt sa bhaved bahuratnavān /
S01svabhupu:1373: SvayambhuP_4.125 nīlotpalārkapadmāni yo dadyāt sa śriyaṃ labhet /
S01svabhupu:1374: yo 'rcayed vilvapatreṇa sa baliṣṭho bhavet kṛtī //
S01svabhupu:1375: SvayambhuP_4.126 dhatturakena nirvārya kena vīreṇa sad vano /
S01svabhupu:1377: SvayambhuP_4.127 sa śrīmān subhago dhīmān bhavetsaugandhitāśraye /
S01svabhupu:1379: SvayambhuP_4.128 puṣpaiḥ patraiḥ phalamūlaistotrai rvā yo 'rcayecchivān /
S01svabhupu:1381: SvayambhuP_4.129 yaśca pradakṣiṇāṃ kṛtvā bhajennityaṃ samādarāt /
S01svabhupu:1384: sa tu pitrālayaṃ gatvā mahānanda sukhaṃ labhet //
S01svabhupu:1385: SvayambhuP_4.131 yaścanāma samuccārya japitvā ca samāhitaḥ /
S01svabhupu:1387: SvayambhuP_4.132 aṣṭāṃgaiḥ praṇatiṃ kṛtvā yo bhajet tān maheśvarān /
S01svabhupu:1388: sa yāyāt saṅgatāveva durgatiṃ na kadācan //
S01svabhupu:1389: SvayambhuP_4.133 smṛtvā dhyātvā samuccārya nāmapi yo bhajat sadā /
S01svabhupu:1391: SvayambhuP_4.134 yaśca dṛṣṭā prasannātmā praṇamet sāṃjalirmudā /
S01svabhupu:1392: so 'pi divyāmṛtaṃ bhuktvā ramet svarge suraiḥ saha //
S01svabhupu:1395: SvayambhuP_4.136 tadatra bhūtale śuddha vidhāya puramāśrayan /
S01svabhupu:1398: āgatya saṃsthiti kṛtvāni vaseyuḥ sadā mudā //
S01svabhupu:1401: SvayambhuP_4.139 tathā devā surendrāścaṃ sarve lokādhipā api /
S01svabhupu:1403: SvayambhuP_4.140 gandharvā guhyakā yakṣāḥ kinnarā rākṣasā api /
S01svabhupu:1404: kumbhāṇḍā garuḍā nāgāḥ siddhā vidyādharā api //
S01svabhupu:1405: SvayambhuP_4.141 sādhyāśca mātṛkā ścāpi sa bhairavagaṇā api /
S01svabhupu:1411: SvayambhuP_4.144 eṣāṃ ca vītarāgānāṃ tīrthānāṃ cānubhāvatāṃ /
S01svabhupu:1417: SvayambhuP_4.147 tataḥ saḥnṛpa utthāya sāñjalistaṃ munīśvaraṃ /
S01svabhupu:1418: krakucchanda sa saṃghaṃ ya praṇatvevaṃ nyavedayata //
S01svabhupu:1420: puraṃ vidhāya lokānāṃ hitārthe nivase khalu //
S01svabhupu:1421: SvayambhuP_4.149 tad bhavān kṛpayālokya sarvadātra himālaye /
S01svabhupu:1423: SvayambhuP_4.150 iti saṃprārthite tena bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
S01svabhupu:1425: SvayambhuP_4.151 nāhaṃ sadātra tiṣṭheyaṃ careyaṃ sarva bhūtale /
S01svabhupu:1427: SvayambhuP_4.152 ityādiśya munīndreṇa krakuchandaḥ sa sāṃdhikaḥ /
S01svabhupu:1429: SvayambhuP_4.153 tato dharmākaraḥ so 'tra vidhāya nagaraṃ tathā /
S01svabhupu:1431: SvayambhuP_4.154 tadātra sarve āgatya mandireṣu samantataḥ /
S01svabhupu:1432: āśritya saṃsthitiṃ kṛtvā nivasanto mudā caran //
S01svabhupu:1435: SvayambhuP_4.156 tathā devā surādyāśca sarve lokādhipā api /
S01svabhupu:1439: SvayambhuP_4.158 bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ścailakāḥ śrāvakā api /
S01svabhupu:1441: SvayambhuP_4.159 tathānya tīrthikāḥ śaivā vaiṣṇavāḥ kaulikā api /
S01svabhupu:1444: vivikte āśrame ramye samāśritya mudā vasan //
S01svabhupu:1445: SvayambhuP_4.161 munīndrā api cāgatya vihṛtyātra sasāṃdhikāḥ /
S01svabhupu:1451: SvayambhuP_4.164 tadeteṣu ca tīrtheṣu snātvā carata sadvrataṃ /
S01svabhupu:1452: pāpaṃ hantuṃ śubhaṃ prāptuṃ samīchantyatra ye narāḥ //
S01svabhupu:1453: SvayambhuP_4.165 ye 'tra tīrtheṣu sarveṣu snātvā nityaṃ samāhita /
S01svabhupu:1454: japa yajñādi karmmāṇi kṛtvā caranti samvaraṃ //
S01svabhupu:1456: datvā dānaṃ samādhāya dhyātvāpīśaṃ bhajanti ca //
S01svabhupu:1457: SvayambhuP_4.167 te 'pi sarve vikalmāṣāḥ pariśuddha trimaṇḍalāḥ /
S01svabhupu:1459: SvayambhuP_4.168 tataste sarva sattvānāṃ hitārthe dharma sādhakāḥ /
S01svabhupu:1464: arhanta strividhāṃ bodhiṃ prāpyeyuḥ saugataṃ padaṃ //
S01svabhupu:1465: SvayambhuP_4.171 evaṃ matvātra tīrtheṣu sarveṣu bodhivāṃchibhiḥ /
S01svabhupu:1466: nātvā dānādi karma karttavya sarvadā bhave //
S01svabhupu:1467: SvayambhuP_4.172 ityādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa samādiṣṭaṃ nisamya te /
S01svabhupu:1469: iti śrī svayaṃbhū caitya samutpatti kathā vītarāgatīrtha rāṣṭra pravarttano nāma caturtho 'dhyāyaḥ samāptaḥ /
S01svabhupu:1471: SvayambhuP_5.1 athāsau ca mahāsattva maitreya sāñjalirmudā /
S01svabhupu:1473: SvayambhuP_5.2 bhagavan tatra tīrthānāṃ snātvā dānādi karmmajaṃ /
S01svabhupu:1475: SvayambhuP_5.3 iti saṃprārthite tena bhagavānsa munīśvaraḥ /
S01svabhupu:1477: SvayambhuP_5.4 sādhu śṛṇu mahāsattva tīrtha sevā phalodbhavaṃ /
S01svabhupu:1478: puṇyaṃ tad viśeṣatvaṃ vakṣāmi sarva bodhane //
S01svabhupu:1479: SvayambhuP_5.5 tadyathā mūlatīrthāni kathyante dvādaśātra hi /
S01svabhupu:1481: SvayambhuP_5.6 amogha phaladāyinyāṃ vāgmatyāṃ yatra saṃgame /
S01svabhupu:1485: SvayambhuP_5.8 yenarā śraddhayā tatra puṇyatīrthe yathāvidhiḥ /
S01svabhupu:1487: SvayambhuP_5.9 japa yajñādi karmmāṇi kuryuḥ saptadinānyapi /
S01svabhupu:1495: SvayambhuP_5.13 tataśca māradāyiṇyo vāgmatyā yatra saṃgamaḥ /
S01svabhupu:1499: SvayambhuP_5.15 tatrāpi śānta tīrtha ca ye kleśa duḥṣitā narāḥ /
S01svabhupu:1503: SvayambhuP_5.17 dadyurdānāṃni cārthi bhyo yathābhilaṣitaṃ mudā /
S01svabhupu:1507: SvayambhuP_5.19 tataste bodhi sambhāraṃ pūrayitvā yathākramaṃ /
S01svabhupu:1511: SvayambhuP_5.21 rudradhārā mṛtākhyātā tayā ca tatra saṃgame /
S01svabhupu:1512: triveṇī saṃgame tena śaṃkara tīrtha mucyate //
S01svabhupu:1513: SvayambhuP_5.22 tatra nāgādhipa śaṃkhapālo gaurāti sundaraḥ /
S01svabhupu:1515: SvayambhuP_5.23 tatra śaṃkara tīrthe ye mānavāśca yathāvidhiḥ /
S01svabhupu:1522: labheyuḥ śrī mahāpuṣṭiśānti guṇā ca śāntyapi //
S01svabhupu:1523: SvayambhuP_5.27 durggati tena yāyuśca saṃjātāḥ saṅgatau sadā /
S01svabhupu:1526: arhanta strividhāṃ bodhi prāpyeyuḥ saugataṃ padaṃ //
S01svabhupu:1527: SvayambhuP_5.29 tataśca rājamañcaryā vāgmatyā yatra saṃgamaṃ /
S01svabhupu:1531: SvayambhuP_5.31 tatra ye mānavāyā vadeka viṃśativāsaraṃ /
S01svabhupu:1532: snāna dāna japa dhyānaṃ kuryu dadyuśca saṃvaraṃ //
S01svabhupu:1535: SvayambhuP_5.33 te 'pi na durggati yāyuḥ sadāsadgati saṃbhavāḥ /
S01svabhupu:1539: SvayambhuP_5.35 tathātra vimalāvatyā keśāvatyā ca saṃgameḥ /
S01svabhupu:1543: SvayambhuP_5.37 tatra manorathe tīrthe manujā ye yathāvidhiḥ /
S01svabhupu:1545: SvayambhuP_5.38 te 'pi na durgatiṃ yāyuḥ sadā sadgatisaṃbhavāḥ /
S01svabhupu:1553: SvayambhuP_5.42 tatra nāgo palālākhyaḥ pītavarṇṇo mahākṛtiḥ /
S01svabhupu:1557: SvayambhuP_5.44 te 'pi na durgatiṃ yāyuḥ sadā saṅgatisaṃbhavāḥ /
S01svabhupu:1559: SvayambhuP_5.45 kali vighna mala kleśa nirmukta bhadracāriṇaḥ /
S01svabhupu:1563: SvayambhuP_5.47 tataḥ suvarṇṇavatyā ca bāgamatyā yatra saṃgame /
S01svabhupu:1567: SvayambhuP_5.49 tatra ye manujā yāvadeka viṃśativāsaraṃ /
S01svabhupu:1569: SvayambhuP_5.50 te 'pi na durggatiṃ yāyuḥ sadā saṅgatisaṃbhavāḥ /
S01svabhupu:1579: SvayambhuP_5.55 snāna dānādi karmmāṇi kuryuḥ sarvāṇi purvavat /
S01svabhupu:1580: te 'pi na durggati yāyurjātāḥ sadāpi saṅgatau //
S01svabhupu:1587: SvayambhuP_5.59 tataśca yatra vāgmatyāḥ keśāvatyā ca saṃgameḥ /
S01svabhupu:1589: SvayambhuP_5.60 gaṃgā ca yamunācāpi tathā devī sarasvatī /
S01svabhupu:1590: parva pratyāgatā tatra tena pañca samāgamā //
S01svabhupu:1591: SvayambhuP_5.61 tatra nāgādhipaḥ śuklo varuṇā sarva nāgarāt /
S01svabhupu:1593: SvayambhuP_5.62 tatra ye mānavā yāvadekaviṃśati vāsaraṃ /
S01svabhupu:1595: SvayambhuP_5.63 te 'pi na durggatiṃ yāyuḥ sadā sadgatisaṃbhavāḥ /
S01svabhupu:1607: SvayambhuP_5.69 snāna dānāni sarvāṇi kuryuḥ karmmāṇi pūrvavat /
S01svabhupu:1608: te 'pi nadurgatīṃ yāyuḥ sadā sadgati saṃbhavāḥ //
S01svabhupu:1609: SvayambhuP_5.70 rati prīti vaśānanda mahāsaukhya samanvitā /
S01svabhupu:1613: SvayambhuP_5.72 arhanta śtrividhāṃ bodhiṃprāpya yāyu rjinālayaṃ /
S01svabhupu:1619: SvayambhuP_5.75 snāna dānaṃ japa dhyānaṃ kuryuryajñaṃ ca pūrvavat /
S01svabhupu:1620: te 'pina durgatiṃ yāyuḥ sadā sadgati saṃbhavāḥ //
S01svabhupu:1625: SvayambhuP_5.78 arhanta trividhāṃ bodhi prāpyeyuḥ saugataṃ padaṃ /
S01svabhupu:1628: tatra nāgādhipaḥ śukraḥ śrīkānti divya sundaraḥ //
S01svabhupu:1631: SvayambhuP_5.81 snātvā yajñādi karmmāṇi kuryuḥ sarvāṇi pūrvavat /
S01svabhupu:1632: te 'pi na durggatīṃ yāyuḥ sadā sadgati saṃbhavāḥ //
S01svabhupu:1639: SvayambhuP_5.85 anyānyapi ca saṃtyatra tāni vakṣyāmyahaṃ śṛṇu /
S01svabhupu:1643: SvayambhuP_5.87 snāna dānāni karmmāṇi kuryuḥ sarvāṇi pūrvavat /
S01svabhupu:1651: SvayambhuP_5.91 nityasnānaṃ japa dhyānaṃ kṛtvā yajñaṃ ca sevitaṃ /
S01svabhupu:1653: SvayambhuP_5.92 tatra ye manujā snāyūste yāyuḥ paramāṃ gatiṃ /
S01svabhupu:1654: dāna yajña japādiśca kuryu dhyātvāyi ceśvaraṃ //
S01svabhupu:1663: SvayambhuP_5.97 snāna dāna japa dhyānaṃ kuryuryajñaṃca pūrvavat /
S01svabhupu:1669: SvayambhuP_5.100 tenedaṃ prāthitaṃ prāryatārā tīrtha subhāgyadaṃ /

S01svabhupu:2131: SvayambhuP_6.180 jñānaṃ hi te 'sti yattena jñānaśrī mitra ucyase /
S01svabhupu:2133: SvayambhuP_6.181 ākāśāt pakṣivad gatvā svāśrame samupāyayau /
S01svabhupu:2135: SvayambhuP_6.182 samākhyāya sa mañjuśrī stasthau lokahitārthabhṛt /
S01svabhupu:2140: iti matvātra ye dharmadhātu vāgīśvara narāḥ //
S01svabhupu:2143: SvayambhuP_6.186 saddharmma dhāraṇī vidyāmantrāṇi dhārayanti ye /
S01svabhupu:2152: SvayambhuP_6.190 iti matvābhivāchanti prāptuṃ ye saugataṃ padaṃ /
S01svabhupu:2158: SvayambhuP_6.193 āśu te vimalātmānaḥ pariśuddha trimaṇḍalāḥ /
S01svabhupu:2162: SvayambhuP_6.195 tataḥ saṃbodhisaṃbhāraṃ pūrayitvā drutaṃ kramāt /
S01svabhupu:2164: SvayambhuP_6.196 ityādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa niśamya te sabhāśritāḥ /
S01svabhupu:2166: itiśrī svayaṃbhū dharmmadhātu vāgīśvarābhidhāna prasiddha pravartano nāma ṣaṣṭho 'dhyāyaḥ /
S01svabhupu:2168: SvayambhuP_7.1 atha bhūyaḥ sa maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāmatiḥ /
S01svabhupu:2174: SvayambhuP_7.4 iti saṃprārthitaṃ tena maitreyena munīśvaraḥ /
S01svabhupu:2176: SvayambhuP_7.5 śṛṇu maitreya yenāyaṃ guptikṛto prakāśane /
S01svabhupu:2178: SvayambhuP_7.6 tadyathā nivṛtiṃ yāte saṃbuddhe kanakamunau /
S01svabhupu:2179: viṃśati varṣa sāhasra nṛrṇāmāyu yadā bhavet //
S01svabhupu:2186: SvayambhuP_7.10 yadā sa kāśyapaḥ śāstā sarvatraidhātukādhipaḥ /
S01svabhupu:2188: SvayambhuP_7.11 tatsaddharmmāmṛtaṃ pātuṃ sarve lokāḥ samāgatāḥ /
S01svabhupu:2192: SvayambhuP_7.13 kumbhāṇḍā rākṣasāścāpi nāgāśca garuḍā api /
S01svabhupu:2196: SvayambhuP_7.15 vaiśyāśca mantriṇo 'mātyā bhṛtyā sainyādhipāgaṇā apiḥ /
S01svabhupu:2198: SvayambhuP_7.16 paurā jānapadā grāmyānaigamāḥ pārvatā api /
S01svabhupu:2199: tathonya deśikā lokā api sarvve samāgatāḥ //
S01svabhupu:2200: SvayambhuP_7.17 tatra sabhāsanāsīnaṃ saṃbuddha staṃ munīśvaraṃ /
S01svabhupu:2202: SvayambhuP_7.18 bhikṣavaḥ śrāvakāḥ sarve yatayo yogino 'piḥ /
S01svabhupu:2209: sarve 'pi te munīndra staṃ dṛṣṭvā yayau pramoditāḥ //
S01svabhupu:2210: SvayambhuP_7.22 tatra sarve 'pi te lokāstaṃ munīndraṃ yathākramaṃ /
S01svabhupu:2212: SvayambhuP_7.23 tatra sarve 'pi te lokāḥ parivṛtya samantataḥ /
S01svabhupu:2214: SvayambhuP_7.24 tatsaddharmmāmṛtaṃ pātuṃ tṛṣārttā iva sāgaraṃ /
S01svabhupu:2222: SvayambhuP_7.28 tataḥ sarve 'pi te lokāḥ saṃbuddha guṇavāñchinaḥ /
S01svabhupu:2223: bodhicaryā vrataṃ dhṛtvā saṃcarire sadā śubhe //
S01svabhupu:2224: SvayambhuP_7.29 tadā sarvāṇi kāryāṇi kṛtvā vajrī sa yogavit /
S01svabhupu:2226: SvayambhuP_7.30 tato gatvā mahācīne sa mañjuśrī jināśrameṃ /
S01svabhupu:2228: SvayambhuP_7.31 atra teṣāṃ śarīrāṇi śiṣyāḥ sarve 'pi pāvake /
S01svabhupu:2232: SvayambhuP_7.33 yeyīdaṃ caityamabhyarcya bhajanti śraddhayā sadā /
S01svabhupu:2235: atra mañjuśrī yaścaitya sarvadā prabhajantu te //
S01svabhupu:2236: SvayambhuP_7.35 ityādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa niśamya te sabhājanāḥ /
S01svabhupu:2238: SvayambhuP_7.36 athāsau bhagavān bhūyaḥ śākyasiṃho munīśvaraḥ /
S01svabhupu:2240: SvayambhuP_7.37 tata ścirāṅgate kāle gauḍarāṣṭre narādhipaḥ /
S01svabhupu:2242: SvayambhuP_7.38 sa rājā suciraṃ rājyaṃ nītidharmmeṇa pālayan /
S01svabhupu:2246: SvayambhuP_7.40 tadā sarve 'pi te lokāḥ saddharmaguṇalālasāḥ /
S01svabhupu:2250: SvayambhuP_7.42 dṛṣṭvā sa nṛpatī rājā sarvāllokāñchubhārthinaḥ /
S01svabhupu:2252: SvayambhuP_7.43 bho lokāḥ paurikāḥ sarve saddharma yadi vāñchatha /
S01svabhupu:2258: SvayambhuP_7.46 ityādiṣṭaṃ narendreṇa sarve lokā niśaṃmyate /
S01svabhupu:2260: SvayambhuP_7.47 tataḥ sarve 'pi te lokā dhṛtvā rājñānuśāsanaṃ /
S01svabhupu:2266: SvayambhuP_7.50 atha pracaṇḍadevau 'sau dṛṣṭvā rājyaṃ mahotsavaṃ /
S01svabhupu:2272: SvayambhuP_7.53 sadā bhave bhaved bhadrameva saddharmmacāriṇāṃ /
S01svabhupu:2278: SvayambhuP_7.56 iti niścitya sa prājñaḥ pracaṇḍadeva ātmavit /
S01svabhupu:2280: SvayambhuP_7.57 bho sarva mantriṇo yūyaṃ śṛṇudhvaṃ me vaco hitaṃ /
S01svabhupu:2284: SvayambhuP_7.59 iti me trasyate cittaṃ durgati bhayaśaṃkitaṃ /
S01svabhupu:2286: SvayambhuP_7.60 bhave bhavet sadā bhadrameva saddharmacāriṇāṃ /
S01svabhupu:2288: SvayambhuP_7.61 anartharājyaṃ viṣayopabhogyaṃ bhayaṃkaraṃ sarpabhayākulaṃ yat /
S01svabhupu:2289: anityamasāreti vicintya tatra āgāramadhyāvasituṃ na rocate //
S01svabhupu:2292: SvayambhuP_7.63 tadahaṃ svātmajaṃ putraṃ śaktidevaṃ nṛpāsane /
S01svabhupu:2294: SvayambhuP_7.64 tad bhavanto niśamyātra sarve 'pi mama śāsanaṃ /
S01svabhupu:2296: SvayambhuP_7.65 ityādiṣṭaṃ narendreṇa śrutvā te mantriṇo janāḥ /
S01svabhupu:2298: SvayambhuP_7.66 tadā sa rājā putraṃ śaktidevamāmantrayaivamāha /
S01svabhupu:2300: SvayambhuP_7.67 atrāhaṃ jarasābhikrāntaṃ nūnaṃ syād nirjitendriyaṃ /
S01svabhupu:2302: SvayambhuP_7.68 tad vanāśrayamicchāmi śreyaḥ ślāghena yatmanā /
S01svabhupu:2303: puro mṛtyu ripuṃ hanti gṛhasaṃraktameva vā //
S01svabhupu:2304: SvayambhuP_7.69 tasmāt saṃsārabhīto me vahudhā bhayaśaṃkayā /
S01svabhupu:2305: nātra sthātuṃ manoreme gacchāmi nirjanaṃ vanaṃ //
S01svabhupu:2306: SvayambhuP_7.70 tasmāt mayā yathā proktaṃ tathā caritumarhasi /
S01svabhupu:2308: SvayambhuP_7.71 lokān mā khekha yattāpaiḥ kuladharmma samācara /
S01svabhupu:2311: mā mṛṣāvāda paiśūnyaṃ pāruṣyaṃ saṃbhinnameva ca //
S01svabhupu:2314: SvayambhuP_7.74 pāpānāṃ mūla eṣo hi sugateneti deśitaḥ /
S01svabhupu:2316: SvayambhuP_7.75 tatkasmāt dharmmeṇa prāpyate rājyaṃ dharmmeṇa dhanavarddhanaṃ /
S01svabhupu:2318: SvayambhuP_7.76 kāmasidhyena mokṣaṃ ca prāpyate nātra saṃśayaḥ /
S01svabhupu:2320: SvayambhuP_7.77 tataḥsa janako rājā śaktidevaṃ mamātmajaṃ /
S01svabhupu:2323: tatra sa janakaḥ sarva putrāya sarvamarppayet //
S01svabhupu:2327: namāma pitaraṃ tena śrutvā vākyaṃ rasāniva //
S01svabhupu:2328: SvayambhuP_7.81 dhṛtvājñāṃ te yathā tāta prajānāṃ pratipālane /
S01svabhupu:2329: iti praśāśya tato bhūpaḥ pracaṇḍadeva sanmatiḥ //
S01svabhupu:2330: SvayambhuP_7.82 prabodhya putrapatnyādiṃ eko yayau vanāśrame /
S01svabhupu:2331: tṛṇāsanasa tatra sa nirjaneraṇye vivikte utajāśraye //
S01svabhupu:2339: tadevaṃ nirjjane sthitvā kiṃ me dharmārthasādhanaṃ //
S01svabhupu:2340: SvayambhuP_7.87 vinā sattvahitārthena nirartha tapasāpi hi /
S01svabhupu:2344: SvayambhuP_7.89 tadatra nirjjane sthitvā tapasā niṣphalaṃ mama /
S01svabhupu:2346: SvayambhuP_7.90 vidyāsiddhiḥ samṛddhiśca kṣaṇaṃ vīryabalaṃ śubhaṃ /
S01svabhupu:2354: SvayambhuP_7.94 āśu bodhiṃ samāsādya saṃbuddhapada māpnuyāṃ /
S01svabhupu:2355: iti niścitya sa prājñaḥ pracaṇḍadeva utthitaḥ //
S01svabhupu:2358: SvayambhuP_7.96 puṇyakṣetreṣu tīrtheṣu pīṭheṣu prāgraman mudā /
S01svabhupu:2359: evaṃ bhraman sa sarvatra bhūtaleṣu yathākramaṃ //
S01svabhupu:2368: SvayambhuP_7.101 aṣṭāṃgai praṇatiṃ kṛtvā dhyātvā japtvā bhajan mudā /
S01svabhupu:2370: SvayambhuP_7.102 caityamabhyarcya saṃstutvā gītairnatvā bhajan mudā /
S01svabhupu:2375: śraddhayā śaraṇaṃ gatvā smṛtvā dhyātvā samāhitaḥ //
S01svabhupu:2376: SvayambhuP_7.105 tad vidyā dhāraṇīmantraṃ japitvā prābhyanandata /
S01svabhupu:2378: SvayambhuP_7.106 tīrthānyetāni sarvāṇi sa samīkṣya prābhyanandata /
S01svabhupu:2379: tata sa teṣu tīrtheṣu sarveṣvapi yathākramaṃ //
S01svabhupu:2380: SvayambhuP_7.107 snātvā dānavratādīni kṛtvā bhajan pramoditaḥ /
S01svabhupu:2382: SvayambhuP_7.108 yathāvidhi samabhyarcya stutvā natvā bhajan kramāt /
S01svabhupu:2387: tataḥ sa mañjudevasya śiṣyaṃ śāsana sambhṛtaṃ //
S01svabhupu:2393: iti saṃprārthitaṃ tena niśamya sa guṇākaraḥ //
S01svabhupu:2395: ehi bhadra samīcchā te yadyasti bauddhasambare //
S01svabhupu:2397: ityuktvā sa mahābhijñaḥ pravrajitaṃ vidhāya taṃ //
S01svabhupu:2404: SvayambhuP_7.119 triratnabhajanaṃ kṛtvā tasthau bodhivrataṃ caran /
S01svabhupu:2405: sa ekasmin dine cemaṃ jyotīrūpaṃ prabhāsvaraṃ //
S01svabhupu:2407: aho hyayaṃ svayaṃ jāto jyotirūpo prabhāsvaraḥ //
S01svabhupu:2410: SvayambhuP_7.122 evaṃ saṃbhāṣayan lokān saṃsthāsyate jagaddhite /
S01svabhupu:2411: yataḥ kalau samayā te loka pañcakaṣāyite //
S01svabhupu:2412: SvayambhuP_7.123 sarve lokā durācārā bhaviṣyanti durāśayāḥ /
S01svabhupu:2420: SvayambhuP_7.127 imaṃ caityaṃ pratikṣipya ratnāni saṃharet tadā /
S01svabhupu:2423: evaṃ tadā kalau kāle dhvaṃsite 'smin jinālaye //
S01svabhupu:2426: SvayambhuP_7.130 guptikarttu śilāchādya caityaṃ kuryā mahochrayaṃ /
S01svabhupu:2427: tadā sarve 'pi lokāste imaṃ stūpaṃ mahochritaṃ //
S01svabhupu:2428: SvayambhuP_7.131 samīkṣya śraddhayā bhaktyā bhajiṣyanti prasāditāḥ /
S01svabhupu:2430: SvayambhuP_7.132 subhikṣaṃ maṅgalotsāhaṃ nirutpātaṃ bhaved dhruvaṃ /
S01svabhupu:2431: iti dhyātvā sa śāntaśrīḥ śāstāraṃ taṃ punarmudā //
S01svabhupu:2434: SvayambhuP_7.134 dharmmādhātumimaṃ caityaṃ gupti karttuṃ surakṣaṇe /
S01svabhupu:2436: SvayambhuP_7.135 stūpaṃ kṛtvā pratiṣṭhāpya sthirīkarttuṃ samutsahe /
S01svabhupu:2439: iti saṃprārthite tena śāntaśriyā niśamya saḥ //
S01svabhupu:2442: SvayambhuP_7.138 pratyekaṃ śrāvakaṃ yānaṃ muktvā mahati saṃśritaḥ /
S01svabhupu:2444: SvayambhuP_7.139 tato mārān vinirjjitya samārādhya jineśvaraṃ /
S01svabhupu:2446: SvayambhuP_7.140 iti śāstā samādiṣṭaṃ niśamya sa pramoditaḥ /
S01svabhupu:2450: SvayambhuP_7.142 iti saṃprārthite tena śāntaśriyā niśamya saḥ /
S01svabhupu:2452: SvayambhuP_7.143 yadi śraddhāsti te bhadra vajracaryā mahāvrataṃ /
S01svabhupu:2454: SvayambhuP_7.144 ityuktvā sa mahācāryastasmai śāntaśriye kramāt /
S01svabhupu:2456: SvayambhuP_7.145 śāntaśrīvajrācārya iti sthāpitaḥ tatkṣaṇe 'rye cādhijñaprāpto 'bhūt /
S01svabhupu:2458: SvayambhuP_7.146 sa svātmā dakṣiṇāṃ tasmai gurave pradadau mudā /
S01svabhupu:2459: tataḥ sa vajradhṛg yogī mahābhijñaḥ susiddhimān //
S01svabhupu:2460: SvayambhuP_7.147 svakuleśaṃ samārādhya sagaṇaṃ prābhajan mudā /
S01svabhupu:2461: tataḥ sa vajradhṛg yogī mahābhijñaḥ susiddhimān //
S01svabhupu:2465: bhagavan nātha sarvajña bhavatāṃ rakṣaṇāya yat //
S01svabhupu:2467: tad bhavān trijagannātha kṛpayā me prasīdatu //
S01svabhupu:2468: SvayambhuP_7.151 yada trāpyaparārdha me tatsarva kṣantumarhati /
S01svabhupu:2469: iti saṃprārthya sa prājña jyotīrūpaṃ jinālayaṃ //
S01svabhupu:2474: SvayambhuP_7.154 caityaṃ sa śilayāchādya stūpaṃ vyadhāttathottamaṃ /
S01svabhupu:2475: idaṃ stūpaṃ ca sa śāntaśrīḥ pratiṣṭhāpya yathāvidhi //
S01svabhupu:2478: SvayambhuP_7.156 pañca sutāḥ pureṣvevaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya sadābhajat /
S01svabhupu:2479: tad yathā devatā pañca prathamaṃ vāyudevatā //
S01svabhupu:2483: etān sarvān samārādhya sa ācārya yathāvidhi //
S01svabhupu:2484: SvayambhuP_7.159 mahotsāhaiḥ samabhyarcya prābhajan sarvadā mudā /
S01svabhupu:2485: evaṃ kṛtvā sa ācārya śāntaśrīḥ kṛtakṛtyau maharddhikaḥ //
S01svabhupu:2487: tato bhūyaḥ sa ācāryo bodhisattvā mahāmatiḥ //
S01svabhupu:2492: SvayambhuP_7.163 smṛtvā dhyātvā samārādhya saṃtiṣṭheyaṃ jagaddhite /
S01svabhupu:2495: evaṃ tā devatā bhaktyā bhajanti ye yathāvidhi //
S01svabhupu:2497: tad viśeṣaphalaṃ cāpi śṛṇu maitreya sāṃprataṃ //
S01svabhupu:2502: SvayambhuP_7.168 nīrogyaṃ śrīsamāpannaṃ kāmabhojyaṃ sadā bhave /
S01svabhupu:2505: teṣāṃ vahnimahotpātaṃ bhayaṃ kvāpi na vidyate //
S01svabhupu:2508: SvayambhuP_7.171 yathāvidhi samabhyarcya prabhajante sadā mudā /
S01svabhupu:2509: teṣāṃ na vidyate kvāpi durbhikṣotpātajaṃ bhayaṃ //
S01svabhupu:2515: ye cāpyevaṃ samārādhya sagaṇaṃ sambaraṃ jinaṃ //
S01svabhupu:2517: teṣāṃ mārāpasargga ca bhayaṃ kvāpi na vidyate //
S01svabhupu:2522: SvayambhuP_7.178 sarve dharmādhipā nāthā bhaveyuḥ śrīguṇākarāḥ /
S01svabhupu:2527: ya etā devatāḥ sarvāḥ smṛtvā dhyātvāpi sarvadā //
S01svabhupu:2528: SvayambhuP_7.181 nāmāpi ca samuccārya saṃbhajante samādritāḥ /
S01svabhupu:2529: te 'pi sarve na yāsyanti durggatiṃ ca kadācana //
S01svabhupu:2532: SvayambhuP_7.183 triratnaśaraṇaṃ kṛtvā saṃcareran sadā śubhe /
S01svabhupu:2546: SvayambhuP_7.190 na yāyurdugatiṃ kvāpi sadā sadgatisambhavāḥ /
S01svabhupu:2548: SvayambhuP_7.191 tataḥ sarvādhipāste syu rdhammārthi saṃprapūrakāḥ /
S01svabhupu:2550: SvayambhuP_7.192 iti satyaṃ parijñāya bauddhaṃ padaṃ yadīcchatha /
S01svabhupu:2551: etān devān samārādhya bhajadhvaṃ sarvadā bhave //
S01svabhupu:2553: durggatiṃ naiva yāyāta kadācin kutracid dhruvaṃ //
S01svabhupu:2558: SvayambhuP_7.196 iti matvātra ye lokā rvāñchanti saugataṃ padaṃ /
S01svabhupu:2559: sa devān sagaṇāṃ sarvān samārādhya bhajantu te //
S01svabhupu:2560: SvayambhuP_7.197 ityādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa niśamya te sabhāśritāḥ /
S01svabhupu:2562: SvayambhuP_7.198 tadā śāntaśriyā yaṃssaṃ guptikṛto jinālayaḥ /
S01svabhupu:2564: iti śrīsvayaṃbhūdharmmadhātuvāgīśvara guptikṛta pravarttano nāma saptamo 'dhyāyaḥ samāptaḥ /
S01svabhupu:2566: SvayambhuP_8.1 atha sa bhagavāñchāstā sa samādherutthitaḥ punaḥ /
S01svabhupu:2568: SvayambhuP_8.2 śṛṇu maitreya bhūyo syā etad devānubhāvataḥ /
S01svabhupu:2580: SvayambhuP_8.8 tenātra yogino vijñā yatayo brahmacāriṇaḥ /
S01svabhupu:2584: SvayambhuP_8.10 sarvaṣvapi ca tīrtheṣu snānadānādi saṃbaraṃ /
S01svabhupu:2586: SvayambhuP_8.11 etāśca devatāḥ pañca samārādhya yathāvidhi /
S01svabhupu:2590: SvayambhuP_8.13 evamimaṃ ca pucchāgraṃ caityaṃ mañjuśriyāpi te /
S01svabhupu:2592: SvayambhuP_8.14 evaṃ sarve 'pi lokāśca saddharmmābhiratā mudā /
S01svabhupu:2596: SvayambhuP_8.16 tataḥ kālāntareṇātra rājā bhūmi yatirnṛpaḥ /
S01svabhupu:2598: SvayambhuP_8.17 tadā sa nṛpatiḥ prauḍhā yuvā kāmātilālasaḥ /
S01svabhupu:2602: SvayambhuP_8.19 dṛṣṭvā sa sundarīṃ kāntāmagamyāmapi mohitaḥ /
S01svabhupu:2605: mantriṣu sarva rājyāṅga niveśya svecchayā ramet //

S01svabhupu:2694: SvayambhuP_8.65 tadā ko me suhṛt mitraṃ saṃrakṣitumupācarat /
S01svabhupu:2696: SvayambhuP_8.66 dharmāṇāṃ pravaraṃ bauddhaṃ dharmaṃ sarvabhayāpahaṃ /

S01svabhupu:2700: SvayambhuP_8.68 sa eva hi mahācārya etadutpātaśāntaye /

S01svabhupu:2754: SvayambhuP_8.95 iti satyaṃ samākhyātaṃ sarvairapi munīśvaraiḥ /

S01svabhupu:2898: SvayambhuP_8.167 gatvaivaṃ nṛpate tatra nāgapure sametya taṃ /

S01svabhupu:2930: SvayambhuP_8.183 nāgendro 'tra prasīda tvaṃ śāsturājñāṃ śirovahaṃ /

S01svabhupu:2937: tanme śāstrā yathādiṣṭaṃ tathā nūnaṃ careya hi //

S01svabhupu:2958: SvayambhuP_8.197 bho bhavanto mahānāgarājāḥ sarve mayāgrataḥ /

S01svabhupu:2990: SvayambhuP_8.213 tataḥ sa mantravit prājñaḥ sarvanāgādhipājñayā /
S01svabhupu:2994: SvayambhuP_8.215 tato vajrī sa ācāryaḥ sarvān stān bhujagādhipān /

S01svabhupu:3012: SvayambhuP_8.224 sāmprataṃ saphalaṃ janma saṃsārajīvitaṃ ca me /

S01svabhupu:3020: SvayambhuP_8.228 tatra sa nṛpa āśritya samantri sacivo mudā /

S01svabhupu:3024: SvayambhuP_9.1 atha maitreya ālokya samutthāya kṛtāñjaliḥ /
